   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to DDD Guidelines's documentation!
==========================================

These are the (internal) guidelines for the EPFL-UNIL CROSS project
*Digitizing the Dualism Debate*. They contain our project pipeline,
instructions for installation and usage of several programs,
as well as indications for the analyses of the texts.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   pipeline.rst
   tei_publisher.rst
   analyses.rst
